name: Quantum Rooms (Mini Jam 90)
description:
This is my first ever Game Jam, and my first ever released/(kind of) finished game! This is for the Mini Jam 90. The theme is 'illusion.'

The game is heavily inspired by 'Antichamber.' There's only 3 levels, and they're fairly short, but for my first jam, I didn't want to overwork myself, especially since level design was quite hard for this game. Godot's CSG shapes aren't the fastest to work with.

The main goal of the game is to reach the end of each level. You'll have to find keys, and explore the maze of rooms, which switch when you look away.

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Interact (doors): E

Menu (desktop only): Escape

Capture mouse: Left click on screen

Credits:

Programming/Design: James Czekaj

Tools: Godot Engine

Fonts: dafont.com Space, Simple Tfb

Audio: freesound.org Door unlock (modified), others

Note: OSX and linux builds haven't been tested.
